Dingle Peninsula is lighting up today with 7 ft @9s W swell and fresh 18 mph WNW winds. Best spots include Ballybunion Right and Ballybunion Beach, both offering fun waves throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 10 ft @10s WNW with strong 20 mph NW winds, making it poor across the board. Day after, still poor with 6 ft @8s SW and 20 mph SSW winds. Best: today.
